type.name: org.gradle.api.Rule
type.description:
*

A {@code Rule} represents some action to perform when an unknown domain object is referenced. The rule can use the * domain object name to add an implicit domain object.

method.name: apply
method.description: * Applies this rule for the given unknown domain object. The rule can choose to ignore this name, or add a domain * object with the given name. * * @param domainObjectName The name of the unknown domain object.

method.name: getDescription
method.description: * Returns the description of the rule. This is used for reporting purposes. * * @return the description. should not return null.

property.name: description
property.description: * Returns the description of the rule. This is used for reporting purposes. * * @return the description. should not return null.
